attributes.action: Instate a Fairer Election system which will give all parties proportional representation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A fairer Election system will allow many of the smaller parties which currently have little chance under first past the post to be a part of parliament and voice views which the main parties are afraid to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
